Title: Episode 8
Plot:
Demented dwarf killers Joanna and Dr Statham are amazed that they seem to have got away with their hideous crime so consider themselves above the law.
Caroline gets no fewer than three proposals. 
Sue gives birth to an infant with a mane just as impressive as Mac's.
ParentalRatingReason: Offensive language, sexual material and other content that may offend
Writer: Fay Rusling, Gary Howe, James Henry, Oriane Messina
GuestStars: Christina Lesbirel, Richard Katz, Robert Harley, Adam Tandy, Pip Torrens
